name: The No Escape House
description:
Title: The No Escape House

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Puzzle/Escape

Rating: E 10+

Target Market: Puzzle lovers, suspense/horror fans

Game Overview:

A puzzle/escape point and click adventure game where the player wakes up kidnapped and forced to solve a series of puzzles to escape the house and survive. It is a short, two level game with several different puzzles, riddles, and secrets to find.

Instructions:

Left Mouse Button: Interact/Move

Left Mouse Button (Hold): Rotate Camera

Right Mouse Button: Back away from object

Scroll Wheel (When inspecting object): Increase zoom of object

Left Mouse Button (Hold when inspecting): Rotate object

Game Design Team

Kameron Eaton - Game Designer

Free Unity Assets

WorldMaterialsFree
